results.name: Smoke & Mirrors Rooftop
results.description: Rooftop bar with birds-eye views of downtown Washington D.C including a great view of the Capitol Building. One of the best vantage points in the city complete with a range of indoor seating options, and an expansive all-weather patio featuring fireplace and fire pit heaters, a retractable rooftop canopy, and modern lounge seating. The rooftop bar & restaurant boasts an extensive cocktail menu with a focus on local spirits and an elegant offering of small bites to match
results.address: 867 New Jersey Ave SE 11th Floor, Washington DC, DC 20003

results.name: Agua 301
results.description: Foodies: Say hello to modern Mexican cuisine. At Agua 301, every dish is a celebration of Mexico and its delectable traditions. We infuse each meal with contemporary flair so that every bite explodes with flavor. Our team of chefs isn't afraid to step out of the box -- they've mixed quality ingredients with experimental techniques to create a menu that's vibrant, bold, and always fresh. Each week should start off with a bang, and brunch tacos paired with bottomless mimosas are the perfect way to do just that. If unwinding is more your style, cap off the evening on our waterside patio, lime margarita in hand. Either way, we have two words for Yards Park: !Buen provecho!
results.address: 301 Water St SE, Washington DC, DC 20003-3734

results.name: Old House Cosmopolitan
results.description: Homey all-day eatery & bar featuring German dishes made with some locally-sourced and organic ingredients.
results.address: 1024 Cameron St Corner of Cameron and Henry, Alexandria, VA 22314-2427

detailed_address.street: 1024 Cameron St Corner of Cameron and Henry

results.name: Whiskey Charlie
results.description: Whiskey Charlie -- 38.88oN 77.02oW - is a premium rooftop cocktail lounge perched atop the Canopy Washington DC | The Wharf, DC's quintessential lifestyle and entertainment destination. Whiskey Charlie's 10th floor is a roofscape with both an intimate rooftop deck, and an indoor lounge, known as 'The Cabin.' Each area features uninterrupted views of The Wharf that radiate off the marina, while majestic monuments set a brilliant backdrop. We are a 21+ establishment.
results.address: 975 7th St SW Rooftop of the Canopy Hotel, Washington DC, DC 20024-3437

detailed_address.street: 975 7th St SW Rooftop of the Canopy Hotel

results.name: Pisco y Nazca
results.description: Pisco Y Nazca Ceviche Gastrobar DC is a Peruvian restaurant located on L Street Northwest, Washington, DC. This downtown dc restaurant adds a modern twist to Peruvian food. Inspired by Peru's top eateries, the new DC outpost serves up bold-flavored dishes, unique cocktails and a vast selection of local and international beers. Situated in the bustling and vibrant Dupont Circle neighborhood, Pisco y Nazca Ceviche Gastrobar DC brings people together in a space that's packed with personality and soul. Our vibrant bar with open kitchen views is the perfect spot for sipping, socializing, and savoring our crazy good ceviche. Come in for brunch, lunch, dinner or happy hour.
results.address: 1823 L Street Northwest, Washington DC, DC 20036

results.name: Barmini
results.address: 501 9th St NW, Washington DC, DC 20004-2155

results.name: Ambar Capitol Hill
results.description: We proudly invite our guests at Ambar to enjoy the first Dining without Limits Experience in the United States. This unique concept allows diners to savour over 40 dishes and to reorder their favorites without limitations. Ambar embraces everyone with a warm, friendly atmosphere replicating the at home experience. While we may be thousands of miles from the Balkans, with Ambar our fabled, ENDLESS hospitality is ever present. Our new dining approach transforms the traditional experience of ordering an appetizer and entree per person, to gathering around the table for a feast. Our guests enjoy authentic dishes within different categories, like grilled meats and seafood, slow-cooked fare, authentic spreads, baked flatbreads, and pies. Everyone who visits us is welcome to explore 40 unique dishes and the indigenous Balkan premium wines, as well as an expansive collection of traditional brandy called rakia. ZIVELI & WELCOME TO A NEW WAY OF DINING WHERE QUALITY MEETS EXPERIENCE AND VALUE
results.address: 523 8th St SE, Washington DC, DC 20003-2835

results.name: Yayla Bistro
results.description: Yayla Bistro offers a wide variety of traditional and healthy Mediterranean cuisine prepared fresh each day by our Turkish chefs. See full menu on our web page. In addition to our elegant dining room, we have a full-service bar area (with TV) featuring special Happy Hour drinks and appetizers from 4-7 pm on Mon-Fri. We also have outdoor patio seating. Children's menu available. Half price bottles of wine on Mondays. Early Bird menu 3-6 pm on weekdays. Weekend Brunch menu from 11-3. Live Music and Belly Dancer on select Saturdays. We are located one block from from Lee Hwy/ Washington Blvd, a short 0.4 mile walk from East Falls Church metro. We can accommodate groups up to 70. We provide take-out service, and we also offer catering for all types of meetings and events.
results.address: 2201 N Westmoreland St, Arlington, VA 22213-1018

results.name: Kingbird
results.description: We aim to indulge all of your senses at Kingbird. With lively dinners and conversations that comfortably linger into the night in mind, World-renowned designer Ron Arad has created a warm and inviting space, perfectly complimenting the building's original architecture.
results.address: 2650 Virginia Ave NW The Watergate Hotel, Washington DC, DC 20037-1906

detailed_address.street: 2650 Virginia Ave NW The Watergate Hotel

results.name: Keren Restaurant
results.description: This is one of DC's many Eritrean restaurants, but it tends to be overlooked by the better publicized and established Ethiopian community in the city. It's a small place, but offers a fantastic dishes, coffee, and service. There is no review on TripAdvisor for this restaurant (there is one on Yelp!).
results.address: 1780 Florida Ave NW, Washington DC, DC 20009-2658

results.name: Commissary
results.description: Commissary is Logan Circle's casual neighborhood cafe. We serve breakfast & brunch, lunch & dinner, snacks & smoothies as well as house-made desserts, along with an expansive daily happy hour. We have a large bar, cozy lounge area, outside cafe and free Wi-Fi. Our diverse menu is simple and affordable, with breakfast all day, sandwiches, salads and pizza for lunch or dinner, plus a great selection of dinner entrees and daily seasonal specials. Commissary is a perfect any day, any time place.
results.address: 1443 P St NW, Washington DC, DC 20005-1907

results.name: Marcel's by Robert Wiedmaier
results.description: Since 1999, Chef Wiedmaier infuses his Belgian heritage into Marcel's elegant haute French flagship restaurant. Regularly topping the best-of-lists in the nation's capital, in 2011 and 2012, it was rated the top restaurant for food by Zagat as well as one of the top five restaurants for service.
results.address: 2401 Pennsylvania Ave NW, Washington DC, DC 20037-1730

results.name: Old Ebbitt Grill
results.address: 675 15th St NW, Washington DC, DC 20005-5702

results.name: Lafayette Restaurant
results.description: Directly overlooking Lafayette Square towards the White House, The Lafayette is a destination restaurant in Washington, DC featuring a light-filled dining room and carefully prepared menu of upscale contemporary American cuisine. With an attentive staff, stately setting and meal service for breakfast, lunch, dinner and Sunday brunch, The Lafayette provides a truly unique fine dining experience in Washington, D.C.
results.address: 800 16th St NW, Washington DC, DC 20006-4102

results.name: The Capital Grille
results.description: You are cordially invited to join us for an evening or afternoon of relaxed elegance and exceptional cuisine. Our impressive menu of nationally renowned dry aged steaks and the freshest of seafood will ignite your culinary imagination as our award-winning wine list of more than 5,000 bottles awakens your inner sommelier. And as our gracious, knowledgeable servers delight you with their uncanny ability to anticipate your every need, you'll experience firsthand why the American Culinary Federation recently bestowed upon us their "Achievement of Excellence Award." Whether you're celebrating a special occasion or hosting a business luncheon or dinner, we can help you flawlessly pull off any private dining event. Our event planning staff has extensive experience and the ideal materials to work with--a capital setting, distinctive food and unmatched service. Located on the corner of 6th and Pennsylvania.
results.address: 601 Pennsylvania Ave NW, Washington DC, DC 20004

results.name: Rose's Luxury
results.description: The warm and enchanting interior at this intimate adjunct to Aaron Silverman's Pineapple & Pearls is reason enough alone to make this worthy of any Washingtonian's bucket list, but the food puts it over the top. At Rose's Luxury, you're the boss: Each guest chooses two dishes from the prix-fixe menu, and whatever you pick, you simply can't go wrong.
results.address: 717 8th St SE, Washington DC, DC 20003

results.name: Bistro Aracosia
results.address: 5100 MacArthur Blvd NW, Washington DC, DC 20016-3316

results.name: Le Refuge Restaurant
results.address: 127 N Washington St Ste C, Alexandria, VA 22314-3176

results.name: Unconventional Diner
results.address: 1207 9th St NW, Washington DC, DC 20001-4375

results.name: Del Ray Cafe
results.description: a French cafe serving local, natural, and organic products for brunch and dinner daily. To-Go Rotisserie Chicken Dinners nightly from 4pm include a whole baguette & roasted potatoes for $30. Kid menu/family friendly. Homemade dog treats for your 4-legged friends. Handicap Parking in back of restaurant/bike parking in front. Handicap accessible. Conditioned screened porch for 4-season outdoor dining.
results.address: 205 E Howell Ave, Alexandria, VA 22301-1307

results.name: Tortino Restaurant
results.description: At Tortino Restaurant, we elevate the flavors of Italian cuisine with the finest ingredients and contemporary styles. Our Italian restaurant in Washington D.C. offers dishes that transport you to North Italy with every bite. Our chef and owner, Noe, traveled through Italy collecting authentic recipes and flavors, and he brings those back home to D.C. Here, you and your friends can enjoy soups, pastas, risottos, steak, and fish in our elegant dining room. Finish off your meal with a glass of wine or champagne. Visit our restaurant to enjoy authentic Italian food today!
results.address: 1228 11th St NW, Washington DC, DC 20001-4264

results.name: Doyle
results.description: Designed by the renowned Martin Brudnizki studio, Doyle is a glamourous, lounge-like bar with a chic mid-century feel offering panoramic views of Dupont Circle. The drinks list is inspired by the cocktail culture of the 1950s and 1960s and features short and strong classics alongside some playful interpretations of the era's favorites. The back bar showcases a vast array of whiskey, rum, gin and vodka, while the wine list presents a wonderful choice of old and new world wines. A delicious small plates food menu is available throughout the day.
results.address: 1500 New Hampshire Avenue Northwest, Washington DC, DC 20036

results.name: The Capital Burger
results.description: The Capital Burger is dedicated to crafting the signature burger experience. Located in Washington, D.C.'s Mount Vernon Square neighborhood, The Capital Burger is open seven days a week, serving specialty and classic burgers crafted from a proprietary beef blend, paired with a world-class wine list - 25+ offerings by the glass - and featuring a commitment to exceptional service and hospitality.
results.address: 1005 7th Street NW, Washington DC, DC 20001

results.name: The Italian Store
results.address: 3123 Lee Hwy Lyon Village Center, Arlington, VA 22201-4207

results.name: Fiola
results.description: Fiola: Established in 2011, Fiola is Fabio Trabocchi's MICHELIN starred Italian restaurant. It blends tradition and innovation with rich nostalgia while embracing the deep culinary history of Italy and local ingredients from the bounty of Chancellors Rock Farm. You will experience emotion, memory, and joy in the elegant, timeless celebration of Italian lifestyle. Indulge in a multicourse dinner tasting menu offered in Fiola's charming main dining room. A la carte dining is served at the Bar and in our cozy Ezio Room. Since 2019, Fiola is also the only restaurant in Washington, D.C. with a Grand Award from Wine Spectator, placing it among the finest wine destinations in the world. Fiola is the Italian word for "my sweetheart".
results.address: 601 Pennsylvania Ave NW Enter at 678 Indiana Ave, Washington DC, DC 20004-2601

detailed_address.street: 601 Pennsylvania Ave NW Enter at 678 Indiana Ave

results.name: Ambar
results.description: Our aim is to put together the finest products of the New World and Old World for your dining pleasure. Perennially on the edge of great empires, the Balkans owes much of its food culture to its history, geography, and climate. The term Balkan is generally believed to come from the Byzantine word meaning: "a chain of wooded mountains." With a desire to introduce Virginia to cutting edge Balkan cuisine, we created a dining space that will delight and indulge the senses. Primarily featuring "small plates," Ambar also offers wines and spirits from the Balkans not often experienced by the American diner. Ambar showcases the best dishes from the Balkan Peninsula with a modern twist. These dishes are presented artfully, with modern combinations that deliver the flavor profiles in a unique way. Serbian natives Ivan Iricanin and Uros Smiljanic developed the menu with the help of Executive Chef Dejan Pilovic .
results.address: 2901 Wilson Blvd, Arlington, VA 22201-3807

results.name: Joe's Seafood Prime Steak & Stone Crab
results.description: Joe's Seafood, Prime Steak & Stone Crab is the culmination of a partnership between Lettuce Entertain You and Joe's Stone Crab, the legendary seafood restaurant of Miami Beach. Joe's features an extensive selection of seafood, flown in fresh daily, to complement the world's finest Florida Stone Crab claws. Joe's features the signature 16 oz. Bone-In Filet Mignon and 22 oz. New York Strip Steak. Matched with Joe's famous side dishes, dinner only gets better when capped with a slice of key lime pie. Defined by a standard of hospitality born a century ago, Joe's offers a dining experience that is timeless. Tuxedo-clad service provides a sense of tradition, while delivering the warmth and caring service that has defined Joe's since 1913.
results.address: 750 15th St NW, Washington DC, DC 20005-1018

results.name: Gerrard Street Kitchen
results.description: Gerrard Street Kitchen prides itself on eclectic, globally inspired cuisine and a dedication to artful mixology. Led by Executive Chef Bader Ali, the restaurant features sophisticated design, intimate spaces, and an exquisite dinner menu, where the complex flavors of Japan, Morocco, and Korea sit side-by-side with British, Italian, and Indian classics. Popular favorites include Paratha Tacos and Korean Crispy Chicken Wings, which can be paired with signature cocktails such as the gin-based Ten Thyme smash or the fragrant Lavender Lemonade mocktail. Join us for dinner, happy hour, or weekend brunch and explore a world of fascinating flavors.
results.address: 1515 Rhode Island Ave NW, Washington DC, DC 20005-5504

results.name: Ted's Bulletin 14th Street
results.description: Modern American and classic dishes, boozy milkshakes, homemade Ted's Tarts, and breakfast served all day!

results.description: High-energy American bistro in the heart of Shirlington, with art deco decor, a lively bar & patio dining.

results.name: GCDC Grilled Cheese Bar
results.description: DC's 1st premium grilled cheese bar. Locally-sourced Ingredients, Irresistible Cheesiness!

results.name: Logan Tavern
results.description: Located in the dynamic Logan Circle neighborhood, Logan Tavern is a neighborhood restaurant and bar that's as perfect for a quick weekday bite as it is for a Friday night out with friends. Come by for dinner, lunch, happy hour, or our great weekend brunch which includes DC's favorite Bloody Mary, for some comfort food with a twist.
results.address: 1423 P St NW, Washington DC, DC 20005-1907

results.name: 1789 Restaurant & Bar
results.address: 1226 36th St NW, Washington DC, DC 20007

results.name: Convivial
results.address: 801 O St NW, Washington DC, DC 20001-3525

results.name: The Pembroke
results.description: Seated in the heart of one of the most prestigious neighborhood's, Dupont, Pembroke savor global influence fare, which The Washington Post food critic Tom Sietsema described as "cut from a different cloth." The stunning ground-floor restaurant is truly a feast for the senses with a hip glam-meets-cozy vibe. The venue was rated highly by the Washington Post and was quoted as "The Pembroke makes Dupont Circle a destination again." Designed by world-renowned Martin Brudnizki, The Pembroke is complemented by a seasonal outdoor terrace and features an edifying blend of cream-paneled walls adorned with playful artwork, plush velvet plush banquettes beautiful marble tabletops.
results.address: 1500 New Hampshire Avenue Northwest Dupont Circle Hotel, Washington DC, DC 20036

detailed_address.street: 10151 New Hampshire Ave Hillandale Shopping Center

results.name: Founding Farmers DC
results.description: Located just three blocks west of the White House, the award-winning Founding Farmers flagship restaurant has been a destination for locals and tourists alike since its opening in 2008. In this urban farmhouse, guests gather and enjoy their meals in a variety of specially designed spaces. From our handcrafted community farm dining tables and the mezzanine's silo-shaped booths to our more intimate seating arrangements, the LEED Gold Certified design is a 3 Star Certified Green Restaurant(r) and exemplifies our full devotion to aesthetic beauty and sustainability.
results.address: 1924 Pennsylvania Ave NW, Washington DC, DC 20006-3607

results.name: BlackSalt Fish Market & Restaurant
results.description: BlackSalt is the much anticipated concept restaurant from Chef Jeff Black, featuring an upscale fish market fronting a vibrant bar and elegant restaurant.
results.address: 4883 MacArthur Blvd NW, Washington DC, DC 20007-1578

results.name: Jaleo by Jose Andres
results.description: Jaleo brings alive the spirit and flavors of Spain with a menu reflecting the rich regional diversity of classical and contemporary Spanish cuisine, under the direction of renowned chef Jose Andres. Jaleo offers an impressive assortment of tapas, the traditional small dishes of Spain, as well as savory paellas, superb sangrias and a fine selection of Spanish wines and Sherries in a festive, casual atmosphere.
results.address: 480 7th St NW, Washington DC, DC 20004-2207

results.name: Zaytinya by Jose Andres
results.description: Zaytinya offers an innovative mezze menu inspired by Turkish, Greek and Lebanese cuisines, under the direction of renowned chef Jose Andres, served up in a sleek and modern setting. Shared small plates, creative cocktails and unique Mediterranean wines make this spot one of DC's top dining destinations.
results.address: 701 9th St NW Corner G Streets, Washington DC, DC 20001-4572

results.name: Rasika West End
results.address: 1190 New Hampshire Ave NW, Washington DC, DC 20037-1501

results.name: Parkway Deli
results.description: We are a full service restaurant serving breakfast, lunch & dinner. We also offer a great selection of beer, wine, smoked fish, deli meats, cheeses, homemade salads, cakes, pies, cheesecakes, pastries & milkshakes. In addition we make party platters so come check us out! Please note - we are not Kosher
results.address: 8317 Grubb Rd, Silver Spring, MD 20910-2539

results.name: Lebanese Taverna
results.description: Come see our new look with a contemporary feel in a refined setting with subtle touches of a Lebanese home. We've added seats to the bar and a new lounge too! Still great for groups of all sizes and the private room now seats 56 people. Located in walking distance from the Marriott Wardman Park and Omni Shoreham Hotels and directly across the street from the Woodley Park Metro station, our DC location is ideal for corporate and social events. Validated self-parking is also available in the garage directly behind the restaurant. The Cedar Room accommodates up to 60 people for a private seated event and 40 people for a standing reception. For smaller affairs, the room can be offered as a semi privately as well. The main dining room is also available for larger parties.
results.address: 2641 Connecticut Ave NW, Washington DC, DC 20008-1522

results.name: Filomena Ristorante - Georgetown
results.address: 1063 Wisconsin Ave NW, Washington DC, DC 20007-3605

results.name: Ted's Bulletin Capitol Hill
results.description: Modern American and classic dishes, boozy milkshakes, homemade Ted's Tarts, and breakfast served all day!
results.address: 505 8th St SE, Washington DC, DC 20003-2835

results.name: Bobby McKey's Dueling Piano Bar
results.description: Our dueling piano bar comes to life with live music on National Harbor's Fleet Street - only a short stroll from the Gaylord Convention Center & MGM casino. Come clap and sing along to our all request show and see what everyone is talking about. We are the ONLY dueling piano bar in the DC Metro area! Leave your inhibitions and worries at the door and get ready to party, sing, dance and laugh the night away. Bobby McKey's Dueling Piano Bar combines live music, comedy and audience interaction into a non-stop, high-energy show unlike anything you've ever experienced. Buy your show tickets today and join the party you'll never forget! Whether it's a birthday celebration, bachelorette party, corporate gathering, private event or just a hot night out with friends, Bobby McKey's is the perfect venue for any occasion. We make every event unique and unforgettable. Also, check out our calendar for monthly Boozy Brunches, Family & Teen Show dates and upcoming events.
results.address: 172 Fleet St, National Harbor, MD 20745-1575

results.name: Ristorante TOSCA
results.description: Inspired by Northern Italy, Tosca offers modernized Northern Italian cuisine in a serenely beautiful setting.Tosca sources only the freshest ingredients: local produce, fresh house made pastas and farm-raised local proteins.
results.address: 1112 F St NW, Washington DC, DC 20004-1308

results.name: Quill
results.description: Quill is Washington, DC's upscale lounge and cocktail bar. Quill offers an inspired mix of classic and signature cocktails, a dynamic wine list and an elevated bar menu that can be enjoyed on our patio or in the lounge.
results.address: 1200 16th St NW The Jefferson, Washington DC, DC 20036-3202

results.name: La Chaumiere
results.description: Pronounced 'la show me air', La Chaumiere is as close as it gets to dining in a French country "inn". The unpretentious atmosphere enhanced by the central stone fireplace, wood beams and stucco walls offers a rustic and romantic escape from city life.
results.address: 2813 M St NW, Washington DC, DC 20007-3712

results.name: The Warehouse
results.description: Steak, seafood, Creole & other classic American dishes served in a casual yet elegant historical space.
results.address: 214 King St, Alexandria, VA 22314

results.name: Agora
results.description: A-g o* rah\: a gathering place A Mediterranean Mezze Restaurant located in the heart of Washington D.C. is the go-to gathering place for all occasions. Executive Chef Dimo Kolouas, offers tapas with a variety of eclectic dishes inspired by the flavors of Turkey, Greece, Lebanon and more. In addition to its versatile food menu, Agora offers an award-winning selection of wine, locally crafted and Mediterranean beers, house-crafted cocktails and Raki, known as the lion's milk of the Mediterranean.
results.address: 1527 17th St NW, Washington DC, DC 20036-6233

results.name: Vaso's Mediterranean Bistro
results.address: 1118 King St, Alexandria, VA 22314-2925

results.name: Siroc Restaurant
results.address: 915 15th St NW Ste A, Washington DC, DC 20005-2302

results.name: Le Diplomate
results.address: 1601 14th St NW, Washington DC, DC 20009-4306

results.name: Blue Duck Tavern
results.description: Blue Duck Tavern, a contemporary neighborhood restaurant, invites its guests to gather and celebrate in good taste with a menu focusing on the freshest ingredients available from local purveyors and artisans. The menu notes every farm where the main ingredient for the dish was raised before its journey to the table. Dishes are genuine, time-honored and traditional -- slow roasting in wood embers, braising, preserving and smoking techniques bring the true flavors of America's great, simple and wholesome foods to the Blue Duck Tavern. The restaurant has an elegant residential feel through the open staff pantry and kitchen, wood-burning oven and the showpiece Molteni range.
results.address: 1201 24th St NW, Washington DC, DC 20037

results.name: Vermilion Restaurant
results.description: Vermilion offers deceptively simple Modern American cooking in the heart of old town Alexandria. From Chef Inti Villalobos-Coady's seasonal cooking using local, farm-raised products whenever possible, to the warmth of its ambiance and graciousness of hospitality its staff brings to the table, Vermilion serves as an ideal location for a casual weekday dinner, a special occasion destination, or simply a great gathering place for drinks with friends.
results.address: 1120 King St, Alexandria, VA 22314-2925

results.name: The Dabney
results.address: 122 Blagden Alley North West, Washington DC, DC 20001

results.name: Bistro Bis
results.address: 15 E St NW, Washington DC, DC 20001-1501

results.name: il Canale
results.description: Located in the heart of Georgetown, il Canale offers the most authentic Neapolitan pizza in DC, thin-crust made by our Italian pizzaiolos cooked in a wood-fired oven imported directly from Italy. The kitchen offers a menu that brings our native country to your table with every selection-antipasti, pastas, seafood, meat, fresh Bufala mozzarella from Italy, and so much more. The attractive blue-lit, full bar specializes in carefully selected Italian wines. In warm weather, dine alfresco at the sidewalk tables or on the roof-top terrazza overlooking the Georgetown scene. Be sure to check out our lunch menu, featuring three delicious new paninis made with our fresh bread baked instantly in our wood fire brick oven and four new pasta items. Our happy hour, from 4-6 pm Monday-Friday, features not only reduced wine, beer, and Italian aperitivi, but also amazing homemade items for extremely reasonable prices! (Happy Hour restricted to bar area). Wheelchair accessible. GlutenFree options are available
results.address: 1065 31st St NW Georgetown, Washington DC, DC 20007-4408

results.name: The Wharf
results.description: The Wharf is the perfect dining experience for those seeking an authentic taste of Old Town Alexandria's historical roots with its amazing seafood specialties.
results.address: 119 King St, Alexandria, VA 22314-3207

results.name: Busboys and Poets
results.description: Busboys and Poets is a restaurant, bar, events space, bookstore and cultural hub where arts, politics and culture internally collide. Menu is vegan, gluten-free and vegetarian-friendly.
results.address: 2021 14th St NW, Washington DC, DC 20009-4436

results.name: CIRCA at Foggy Bottom
results.description: This is a sister to the flagship store at Dupont Circle.
results.address: 2221 I St NW, Washington DC, DC 20037-2241

results.name: Kinship Restaurant
results.description: Kinship is acclaimed Chef Eric Ziebold and partner Celia Laurent's restaurant. The restaurant is located on the first floor of 1015 Seventh Street NW in an historic brick building dating back to 1907. A second restaurant, Metier, opened in the bi-level space offering a seven course tasting menu in April 2016. Both restaurants commit themselves to offer creative and contemporary American cuisine with a continued dedication to hospitality. Kinship is Chef Ziebold's vision of what the modern American restaurant can be and offers an a la carte menu celebrating the rich diversity of influences that have come to shape American cuisine. The restaurant offers 59 seats plus a 15 seat bar with lounge area and fireplace. Designed by Darryl Carter, a Washington D.C. native and a leader in the design world, Kinship features antique materials and furniture pieces mingling with modern details to create an elegant yet warm and comfortable atmosphere.
results.address: 1015 7th St NW, Washington DC, DC 20001-3607

results.name: Central Michel Richard
results.description: Central Michel Richard Restaurant in Washington DC. James Beard Award , Best New Restaurant. French & American Bistro
results.address: 1001 Pennsylvania Ave NW, Washington DC, DC 20004-2505

results.name: RIS
results.address: 2275 L St NW, Washington DC, DC 20037-1414

results.address: 1122 9th St NW, Washington DC, DC 20001-4314

results.name: Fogo de Chao Brazilian Steakhouse
results.description: Fogo de Chao is an internationally-renowned steakhouse from Brazil that allows guests to discover what's next at every turn. Founded in Southern Brazil in 1979, Fogo elevates the centuries-old culinary art of churrasco - roasting high-quality cuts of meat over an open flame - into a cultural dining experience of discovery.  Please join us in our dining room, in our more casual Bar Fogo, or bring the Fogo Experience to you with Fogo To-Go or Catering. Visit our website to make a reservation or place an order.
results.address: 1101 Pennsylvania Ave NW, Washington DC, DC 20004-2514

results.name: Barcelona Wine Bar
results.description: Barcelona Wine Bar & Restaurant is a warm and welcoming tapas bar inspired by the culture of Spain. The ever-changing menu is focused on clean flavors, seasonal ingredients, specialties from Spain and the Mediterranean, and rustic small plate presentations created by chefs with tremendous talent. Barcelona offers an award-winning selection of wines from Spain and South America-and boasts one of the largest Spanish wine programs in the U.S.
results.address: 1622 14th St NW, Washington DC, DC 20009-4335

results.name: Busboys and Poets
results.description: Busboys and Poets is a restaurant, bar, coffee shop, bookstore and events space where arts, culture and politics intentionally collide.
results.address: 450 K St NW, Washington DC, DC 20001-3097

results.description: Lebanese Taverna Pentagon Row offers a warm and vibrant dining atmosphere with the beauty of traditional Arabic features. The 80 seat outdoor cafe serves as the neighborhood gathering spot for outdoor summer concerts series and Ice Skating in the winter. Located in the center courtyard of Pentagon Row Shops by the ice rink.
results.address: 1101 S Joyce St, Arlington, VA 22202-2064

results.name: DAS Ethiopian Restaurant
results.description: Ethnic Ethiopian cuisine Das in Ethiopian language means a large tent where families get together for all events.
results.address: 1201 28th St NW Georgetown, Washington DC, DC 20007-3361

results.name: Pizzeria Paradiso
results.description: We opened Pizzeria Paradiso so we could make the kind of pizza we longed for but couldn't find in the DC area; the kind of pizza where the crust was the most important part. To create that crust, we start with a wood-burning, domed, stone oven able to cook at a temperature of 650 degrees and above. Then we placed the oven at the heart of the restaurant so our guests would feel the warmth and comfort of its glow evocative of the warmth felt in a close friend's home. Next, we developed a dough that would respond to our oven the way we dreamed. We let our dough rise slowly, work it by hand, lightly grace it with the finest quality toppings, finish it with extra virgin olive oil and cook it in our beloved oven.
results.address: 2003 P St NW Dupont Circle, Washington DC, DC 20036-5910

results.name: RPM Italian
results.description: Located in Washington, D.C.'s Mount Vernon neighborhood, RPM Italian is modern in approach and Italian in spirit and features a contemporary, chef-driven menu with dishes meant to be shared. The sister restaurant to RPM Italian and RPM Steak in Chicago, this location marks the third collaboration between partners R.J., Jerrod and Molly Melman, acclaimed chef Doug Psaltis, and celebrity couple Bill & Giuliana Rancic. Menu highlights include more than a dozen fresh pastas made in house daily, slow-roasted meats, wild fish and seafood, and celebrated Italian classics with an elevated twist. Signature RPM cocktails or any wine from the extensive list enhance the dining experience. Our dining room is currently closed due to COVID-19. But we are offering our menu, meal packages, and special offerings for delivery and pickup.
results.address: 650 K St NW, Washington DC, DC 20001-1341

results.name: Taberna Del Alabardero
results.description: This piece of Spain, just steps from The White House, will transport you to an elegant and royal atmosphere surrounded by friendly faces, an engaging menu and world-renowned wines. Taberna Del Alabardero opened its doors in 1989, becoming the first Spanish restaurant in DC, and this year celebrates its 30 Anniversary with the 2019 Honorary RAMMY award. Spanish Chef Carlos Gomez Segovia brings back the authentic Spanish Cuisine and introduces new dishes with traditional ingredients. Taberna's seasonal menu features classic tapas, luscious paellas, refreshing sangria, and delicious desserts, as well as vegetarian and gluten-free options.
results.address: 1776 I St NW Entrance on 18th St, Between H & I, Washington DC, DC 20006-3700

detailed_address.street: 1776 I St NW Entrance on 18th St, Between H & I

results.name: Hank's Oyster Bar Old Town
results.description: Now open in our NEW Location: 818 N. St. Asaph Street in the heart of Old Town North! Our new location features an expanded dining room, large outdoor patio, several private event spaces and an open air rooftop bar and lounge.
results.address: 818 N. St Asaph Street, Alexandria, VA 22314-1718

results.name: Union Station
results.address: 40 Massachusetts Ave NE, Washington DC, DC 20002-4225

results.name: Bobby Van's Steakhouse
results.description: Bobby Van's Grill marks the return of the powerful New York City chop shop to the downtown D.C. area but with a new twist. This eclectic New American Steakhouse now boasts a slightly more casual family friendly atmosphere as well as catering to the Washington politician. This 536-seat D.C. destination is fully loaded! There's four private, intimate and upscale dining rooms with their own bar and bar services. Two 40-foot long bars can be found with friendly bartenders serving strong drinks and even stronger conversations. The main dining room boasts views of both New York Avenue and the plush marble atrium of the adjoining building amidst its beautiful water fountain. This is an ideal place to meet for power lunches, family gatherings and late night dinners in a relaxed and friendly atmosphere.
results.address: 1201 New York Ave NW, Washington DC, DC 20005-3917

results.name: Il Porto
results.description:
Proudly celebrating our 50th anniversary!
When you think Italian ...Think IL PORTO!! Old Town"s First Italian Restaurant in the Heart of Old Town's Historic Seaport District. Serving Fine Italian Cuisine since 1973.  Let the Italian flag wave you into the restaurant and soon you'll discover why we have so many satisfied customers around town and around the globe.
results.address: 121 King St, Alexandria, VA 22314-3207

results.name: Martin's Tavern
results.description: The historic service, authentic ambiance, and savory comfort food at Martin's Tavern has remained a Georgetown favorite for nearly a century. Locally owned for four generations since 1933, the oldest family-run restaurant in town, Martin's is a long-standing and beloved local landmark. Come see why scores of Georgetown regulars, Hollywood icons, baseball hall of famers, and the District's elite all say, "Meet me at Martin's!"
results.address: 1264 Wisconsin Ave NW, Washington DC, DC 20007-3238

results.name: Taverna Cretekou
results.address: 818 King St, Alexandria, VA 22314-3017

results.name: Tabard Inn Restaurant
results.address: 1739 N St NW, Washington DC, DC 20036-2801

results.name: The Bombay Club
results.address: 815 Connecticut Ave NW, Washington DC, DC 20006-4004

results.name: The Monocle
results.address: 107 D St NE, Washington DC, DC 20002-5657

results.name: Charlie Palmer Steak DC
results.description: Charlie Palmer Steak Washington DC, located in the United Brotherhood of Carpenters building, is dedicated to another fine master craft: bold American food. Under the direction of Executive Chef Dan Perron, the menu not only stars the best American artisan beef cuts like an aged Angus Rib-eye "Cowboy" Steak but updated locally sourced seafood dishes, like Chesapeake Bay Oysters and Soft Shell Crab Fritto Misto. Much more than a steakhouse, the timelessly stylish restaurant moves the political power meetings out of the back room and into private dining spaces, sleek enclaves of dark wood. Located off the wide, open expanse of the National Mall, Charlie Palmer's Steak's rooftop terrace can accommodate 400 guests, offering the city's most impressive view of the Capitol.
results.address: Kurosakicho 8-6, Washington DC, DC 20001-2133

results.name: Bourbon Steak - Four Seasons Washington DC
results.description: Bourbon Steak is a classic American steakhouse offering seasonal, regional fare with Michael Mina's modern twist. Our Executive Chef prepares pristine cuts of American and Japanese beef. Using Michael Mina's signature process, the meat is slow-poached then cooked over a seasoned wood-fired grill to a mouthwatering finish. The bar at BOURBON STEAK features an extensive list of 20th-century cocktails made to order, along with an extensive wine and spirits list. Additionally, the restaurant has a cultivated collection of small-batch bourbons and whiskeys it pours tabled side on its beverage cart. Signature dishes include Dry Aged Tomahawk Rib Eye, Miyazaki Wagyu NY Strip, Michael's Maine Lobster Pot Pie and a trio of duck fat French fries for every table. In the bar do not miss specialty drinks such as The Potomac, a variation of the classic dirty martini prepared with a house-made white truffle brine.
results.address: 2800 Pennsylvania Ave NW Four Seasons Hotel, Washington DC, DC 20007-3717

results.name: Gadsby's Tavern
results.description: Gadsby's Tavern has been offering fine dining since 1770. Enjoy lunch and dinner in one of the elegant Colonial dining rooms. The one-of-a-kind Gadsby's Tavern experience awaits you.

results.name: RedRocks Pizza Napoletana
results.description: RedRocks is located in the upper King Street area of Old Town, at 904 King Street. The 2,500 square foot space is an open floor plan with an open kitchen, spacious high-back booths, marble table tops, high ceilings and a mezzanine section for great private events.

results.name: Daikaya
results.description: Japanese Ramen shop on the first floor. Izakaya tavern on the second. We serve a Sapporo style ramen.
results.address: 705 6th St NW, Washington DC, DC 20001-3703

results.name: Quarterdeck
results.description: A fixture of the Fort Myer Heights neighborhood for over 35 years providing a relaxed atmosphere perfect for family dining or just catching up with old friends. Most notably known for our seasonal Maryland Blue Crab feast and cold beer, we also serve a wide variety of classic American and Seafood fare year round. Stop on by and join us for some crabs!!
results.address: 1200 Fort Myer Dr, Arlington, VA 22209-3503

results.name: Oyamel
results.description: At Oyamel, Jose Andres and his team combine Mexico's rich regional diversity with the vibrant urban atmosphere of Mexico City. The liveliness of the dining room is matched by the creativity of the menu and cocktail list, featuring antojitos--Mexican small plates--ceviches and tacos, plus unique margaritas, and an impressive array of wine, tequila and mezcal. Originally opened in 2004 in the Crystal City neighborhood of Arlington, Oyamel moved to its current home in the Penn Quarter in March of 2007. Oyamel ranks consistently as a top DC dining destination, and was awarded a Bib Gourmand in the 2021 Michelin Guide to Washington, DC.
results.address: 401 7th St NW Corner of 7th & D Streets, Washington DC, DC 20004-2202
